resources.string: "You have received all vaccinations for basic immunization. Your vaccination protection is effective. Please also find out about the recommended booster vaccinations."
"Based on your vaccination and past infection, you are considered to have basic immunization. However, please also find out about the recommended booster vaccinations."
"You have not yet received all the currently planned vaccinations. As such, your vaccination protection is not complete yet."
"2G Certificate"
"Test Certificate"
"Note on Booster Vaccination"
"based on your saved certificates"
"Update Certificate"
"Request reissue directly in the app. You’ll find out how to do this in the next step."

"The EU specifications for certificates involving booster vaccinations have changed. This certificate does not match the current specifications. While the vaccination certificate remains valid, the booster vaccination may not be identified during checks. Therefore, please request the issue of a new vaccination certificate.

Do you have other vaccination certificates or certificates of recovery that are not stored in the app yet? Please scan them now, so they can be considered in the checks.

You can request a new vaccination certificate directly and free of charge in the app. Your consent is required for this."
"Certificates to update:"
"Request reissue directly in the app"
"Renew Certificates"
"Renew a certificate up to 90 days after it has expired directly in the app."

"The technical validity of at least one certificate has expired or will expire soon. You can no longer prove your status with an expired certificate.\n\nYou can request the issue of new certificates free of charge, directly in the app, up to 28 days before a certificate will expire and up to 90 days after a certificate has expired. Your consent is required for this."
"Certificates to renew:"
"Request renewal directly in the app"
